import React from 'react'; import './Rules.css'; const Rules = ({ onBack }) => { return (

Regolamento

Objective:

  • The player must jump onto white platforms to progress to the next level.​
    • Gameplay Mechanics: Starting Time: 30 seconds.​ Webthesis +4 Allgameforum +4 Publicatt +4 Level Progression: Upon reaching a new level, 10 seconds are added to the remaining time.​ Penalty: Jumping onto a blue platform deducts 5 seconds from the available time.​ Neutral Platforms: Orange platforms have no effect on the timer.​ Betting System: Every 10 levels, the player has the opportunity to wager their remaining time in a feature called "Slot 2s" to potentially gain additional time.​ Game Over Condition: The game ends when the timer reaches zero.​

    ); }; export default Rules;
